Which kind of #rstats user are you?

1)
dbh_acer <- data[data$sp=='Acer','dbh']

2)
dbh_acer <- subset(data,sp=='Acer',
select=c(dbh))

3)
dbh_acer <- data %>% filter(sp=='Acer') %>% select(dbh)

4) 
write.xlsx(data, 'data.xlsx')
dbh_acer <- read.xlsx('data_acer_only_dbh.xlsx')
